mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cover_status AS "coverStatus", a.no AS "no", a.tag_no as "tagNo", a.cover_type AS "coverType", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.jurisdiction as "jurisdiction", a.city_code AS "cityCode", a.ad_code AS "adCode", a.district AS "district", a.township AS "township", a.street AS "street", a.street_number AS "streetNumber", a.address_detail AS "addressDetail", a.coordinate_type AS "coordinateType", a.longitude AS "longitude", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.altitude AS "altitude", a.location_accuracy AS "locationAccuracy", a.altitude_accuracy AS "altitudeAccuracy", a.purpose AS "purpose", a.situation AS "situation", a.manufacturer AS "manufacturer", a.size_spec AS "sizeSpec", a.size_rule AS "sizeRule", a.size_diameter AS "sizeDiameter", a.size_radius AS "sizeRadius", a.size_length AS "sizeLength", a.size_width AS "sizeWidth", a.material AS "material", a.owner_depart AS "ownerDepart", a.supervise_depart AS "superviseDepart", a.marker AS "marker", a.is_damaged AS "isDamaged", a.manhole_damage_degree AS "manholeDamageDegree", a.damage_remark AS "damageRemark", a.altitude_intercept AS "altitudeIntercept", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.audit_by AS "auditBy", a.audit_date AS "auditDate", a.is_gwo AS "isGwo", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.project_id AS "projectId", a.project_name AS "projectName"
/*LEFT JOIN cover_owner o ON a.id = o.cover_id*/ LEFT JOIN cover_damage d ON a.id=d.cover_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cover a
WHERE a.id = #{id} group by id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cover( id, cover_status, no, tag_no, cover_type, province, city, jurisdiction, city_code, ad_code, district, township, street, street_number, address_detail, coordinate_type, longitude, latitude, altitude, location_accuracy, altitude_accuracy, purpose, situation, manufacturer, size_spec, size_rule, size_diameter, size_radius, size_length, size_width, material, owner_depart, supervise_depart, marker, is_damaged, manhole_damage_degree, damage_remark, altitude_intercept, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, audit_by, audit_date, del_flag, is_gwo, project_id, project_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{coverStatus}, #{no}, #{tagNo}, #{coverType}, #{province}, #{city}, #{jurisdiction}, #{cityCode}, #{adCode}, #{district}, #{township}, #{street}, #{streetNumber}, #{addressDetail}, #{coordinateType}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{altitude}, #{locationAccuracy}, #{altitudeAccuracy}, #{purpose}, #{situation}, #{manufacturer}, #{sizeSpec}, #{sizeRule}, #{sizeDiameter}, #{sizeRadius}, #{sizeLength}, #{sizeWidth}, #{material}, #{ownerDepart}, #{superviseDepart}, #{marker}, #{isDamaged}, #{manholeDamageDegree}, #{damageRemark}, #{altitudeIntercept}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{auditBy}, #{auditDate}, #{delFlag}, #{isGwo}, #{projectId}, #{projectName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cover SET cover_status = #{coverStatus}, no = #{no}, tag_no = #{tagNo}, cover_type = #{coverType}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, jurisdiction = #{jurisdiction}, city_code = #{cityCode}, ad_code = #{adCode}, district = #{district}, township = #{township}, street = #{street}, street_number = #{streetNumber}, address_detail = #{addressDetail}, coordinate_type = #{coordinateType}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, altitude = #{altitude}, location_accuracy = #{locationAccuracy}, altitude_accuracy = #{altitudeAccuracy}, purpose = #{purpose}, situation = #{situation}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer}, size_spec = #{sizeSpec}, size_rule = #{sizeRule}, size_diameter = #{sizeDiameter}, size_radius = #{sizeRadius}, size_length = #{sizeLength}, size_width = #{sizeWidth}, material = #{material}, owner_depart = #{ownerDepart}, supervise_depart = #{superviseDepart}, marker = #{marker}, is_damaged = #{isDamaged}, manhole_damage_degree = #{manholeDamageDegree}, damage_remark = #{damageRemark}, altitude_intercept = #{altitudeIntercept}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, audit_by = #{auditBy}, audit_date = #{auditDate}, del_flag=#{delFlag}, is_gwo = #{isGwo}, project_id = #{projectId}, project_name = #{projectName} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.* FROM cover a where ${propertyName} = '${value}'
select * FROM cover where cover_status in('wait_audit','deleteing') and ${propertyName} = '${value}'
mapper.update: UPDATE cover SET cover_status='auditing' WHERE cover_status in('wait_audit','deleteing') and id = #{id}
